titles.title: Recognizing Project HOPE for 50 years of exceptional service in improving and saving the lives of millions of children and adults in developing nations through humanitarian assistance and health education.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
9/23/2008--Introduced.
Recognizes Project HOPE for 50 years of service in improving and saving the lives of millions of children and adults in developing nations through humanitarian assistance and health education.
